q: why does the man wearing caps put stainless steel shelves
pred: The man wearing caps is likely using a welding torch to create a welding joint on the stainless steel shelves. Welding is a process of joining metals together by heating them to a high temperature and then applying pressure to create a strong bond. The man is likely using the welding torch to melt the metal and create a strong joint that will hold the shelves together.
